content: I am from the middle east, we recently started CDA for our HIE. Any specific.Net Dll or component validating CDA documents. I have been searching on the internet net past a few days and could not find a good one. My friend asked me to do a post here. If this is not the right place to ask this question, please help me take it to the right stream group. thanks
This is the right place, with the #dotnet stream as a potential alternative, although most on that stream will be purely FHIR oriented. I'm afraid I don't know the answer to your question however.
@shuhaib k have a look at https://github.com/MohawkMEDIC/everest - that might be of help

But that's a code based validator, not a schematron based validator .. and the last update is shown to be 9 years ago. Here's a 14 year old whitepaper on the options regarding CDA validation: http://www.ringholm.com/docs/03020_en_HL7_CDA_common_issues_error.htm
If you want a schematron based approach for CDA, https://art-decor.org/mediawiki/index.php/Main_Page is a well maintained option (not .net based however).

Well ... I wont go into a discussion on code Vs schematron. All I can say is that I've used Everest in the past and that since CDA hasnt changed much the last many years I wouldn't be afraid of an old code base as long as the quality is fine
Thanks for the lead . I am able to do the validation using nmatrix component
